mapper.select: SELECT * FROM xinmusic_music t WHERE t.music_id = #{musicId}

SELECT a.*
,b.music_id AS collect
FROM xinmusic_music a
LEFT JOIN xinmusic_musiclist_music b ON a.music_id = b.music_id and b.musiclist_id = #{defaultId}
WHERE a.music_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT a.* FROM xinmusic_musiclist a WHERE a.create_user_id = #{createUserId} AND a.`status` = 0
SELECT a.* FROM xinmusic_musiclist_music a WHERE a.musiclist_id = #{musiclistId} AND a.music_id = #{musicId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM xinmusic_musiclist_music t WHERE t.musiclist_id = #{musiclistId} AND t.music_id = #{musicId}
